metadata.title: CVE-2024-24784 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The ParseAddressList function incorrectly handles comments (text withinparentheses) within display names. Since this is a misalignment withconforming address parsers, it can result in different trust decisionsbeing made by programs using different parsers.

criterions.comment: golang-1.6 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.10 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.13 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.18 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
